channel.title: Vere
channel.description: An experimental audio diary capturing a bit of spring: one minute or less, every day, from the start of my last term of college to the day I graduate.
channel.itunes:subtitle: An experimental audio diary capturing a bit of spring: one minute or less, every day, from the start of my last term of college to the day I graduate.
channel.itunes:summary: An experimental audio diary capturing a bit of spring: one minute or less, every day, from the start of my last term of college to the day I graduate. Expect stories, candid moments, found sounds, and whatever other curiosities are of the moment, all gathered lovingly by Alec Glassford.
channel.itunes:author: Alec Glassford
channel.googleplay:author: Alec Glassford

item.title: And some time, make the time
item.description: Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.

item.title: Go chasing waterfalls
item.description: It's so incredibly difficult to meet the sublime (in any of its forms) with words, but let's just say: dank.
item.dc:creator: Alec Glassford
item.content:encoded: It's so incredibly difficult to meet the sublime (in any of its forms) with words, but let's just say: dank.
item.itunes:author: Alec Glassford

item.itunes:summary: It's so incredibly difficult to meet the sublime (in any of its forms) with words, but let's just say: dank.

item.title: The morning after
item.description: Sometimes the day is so full that there is no time for any of this nonsense (nor is there an internet connection in the woods that can handle it), and so instead there is the grinding of coffee in the gorgeous crystal stillness of the morning.
item.dc:creator: Alec Glassford
